fatemon.name: belliot
fatemon.desc: A slug-type fatty that jiggles about spraying its putrid sweat.

moves.name: Contort
moves.description: Belliot contorts it's limbs into impossible positions to create a rigid orb-type thing. It's defence-rises sharply!

moves.name: Jiggle
moves.description: Belliot Jiggles about leaking sweat everywhere. His evasivness rises sharply.

moves.name: Slick Moves
moves.description: Belliot dazzles your fattymon with slick moves. While you are distracted, he kicks it in the face

moves.name: Write it down
moves.description: Belliot quickly scribbles down what he needs to do next. His attack rises
